thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Seoul Seizes Second Ship Suspected of Transferring Oil to North Korea

author: Andrew Jeong
title: Seoul Seizes Second Ship Suspected of Transferring Oil to North Korea
text:
SEOUL—South Korean authorities impounded a second ship suspected of transferring oil to North Korea in violation of U.N. sanctions, three Seoul government officials said Tuesday.
A Hong Kong-registered ship was seized in late November, on similar suspicions.
Authorities are unsure if the newly seized ship—the KOTI, registered in Panama—directly... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
